description.text: This module defines SYSTEM related information.
Added new get system uptime interface for netconf.
This is a functions that returns time since this managed entity was last re-initialized.
Indicates the number of days this managed node is up since its last re-initialization.
Indicates the number of hours this managed node is up since its last re-initialization. This is in addition to the value of corresponding instance of 'days'.
Indicates the number of minutes this managed node is up since its last re-initialization. This is in addition to the values of corresponding instance of 'days' and 'hours'.
Indicates the number of seconds this managed node is up since its last re-initialization. This is in addition to the values of corresponding instance of 'days', 'hours' and 'minutes'.
